text: Confirm or Deny is a 1941 American World War II drama movie directed by Archie Mayo and Fritz Lang (uncredited). It stars Don Ameche, Joan Bennett, Roddy McDowall, Raymond Walburn, John Loder, Arthur Shields, Queenie Leonard and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 drama movies Category:1941 war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Movies directed by Archie Mayo Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Confirm or Deny
